Package com.composum.pages.commons.request

Class RequestAspectAdapterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.composum.pages.commons.request.RequestAspectAdapterFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.sling.api.adapter.AdapterFactory
    public class RequestAspectAdapterFactory
extends Object
implements org.apache.sling.api.adapter.AdapterFactory
    the adapter factory for all aspects in the request context of the Pages module

    access mode
    the access mode is normally set by the platform access filter an can be overridden by the parameter 'cpm.access' with the values 'AUTHOR', 'PREVIEW' or 'PUBLIC' if the request is received via an authoring host
    display mode
    the display mode can be specified by the parameter 'pages.mode' with the values 'NONE', 'EDIT', 'PREVIEW', 'BROWSE' or 'DEVELOP' if the request is received via an authoring host
    locale (language)
    the locale is specified by the parameter 'pages.locale' with normal Locale values, e.g. 'en_EN_US', 'de_DE', 'fr'
    Each aspect value specified by a parameter is kept in the session and reused in further request.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      protected class  RequestAspectAdapterFactory.AccessModeFactory
      this factory is adapting to the instance controlled by the platform access manager only - the name of the enum value is stored in request / session
      protected static interface  RequestAspectAdapterFactory.AspectFactory<Type>  
      protected class  RequestAspectAdapterFactory.DisplayModeFactory
      the display mode is a stack object stored in the request and modified during request rendering - the session does not store this aspect - he PagesFrameServlet is storing another value of the same type and key in the session for the frames display mode
      protected class  RequestAspectAdapterFactory.PagesLocaleFactory
      the locale is stored if specified as is in the request and also in the session for further requests
